comments.body: I think it's wise to validate the object as well, in addition to the update. That still assumes that validIngress + validUpdate = validIngress, but it's better than nothing (though in this context validating object doesn't fetch us much, it might in the future).

I think we are inconsistent here, but in general, if we are doing a status update, we should be safe in calling validateStatusUpdate(), strategy_test covers that you cannot update spec as part of status, so at best you are catching object.metadata changes which are accounted for in the validateStatusUpdate call pattern today.
